projects.title: ChromaChat
projects.description: A Full Stack chat application built on MERN stack
projects.details: You can send messages in realtime. Frontend is built on ReactJS, ReduxJs and MaterialUI. Backend is built using NodeJS and MongoDB. It uses pusher channel to send/receive messages in realtime
